text: The Japanese butterfly ray (Gymnura japonica) is a species of ray in the family Gymnuridae. It is found from Japan to Cambodia. ==Sources== * Masuda, H., K. Amaoka, C. Araga, T. Uyeno and T. Yoshino, 1984. The Fishes of the Japanese Archipelago. Vol. 1. Tokai University Press, Tokyo, Japan. 437 p. (text). (Ref. 559) Category:Gymnura Category:Fish described in 1850
title: Gymnura japonica
